snippet: The Labor Department said the economy added 103,000 jobs in September, but Fitch Ratings downgraded the government debt of Spain and Italy.
lead_paragraph: The Labor Department said the economy added 103,000 jobs in September, but Fitch Ratings downgraded the government debt of Spain and Italy.

headline.main: Shares Fall After Europe Debt Downgrades
headline.print_headline: Shares Fall After Europe Debt Downgrades
